dict.string: -- Configuration begin set showHosts to false set sortNames to true -- Configuration end set res to "<?xml version='1.0'?><items>" set q to "{query}" -- set q to "" -- log q tell application "Adium" if q is "-" then set unreadOnly to true set q to "" else set unreadOnly to false end if if q is "" then set aList to (every contact whose status type is not offline) else set aList to (every contact whose status type is not offline and display name contains q) end if set waitingMsgs to name of first contact of (every chat whose unread message count is not 0) set listThem to {} repeat with i in aList set tmp to properties of i set listThem to listThem & {{display name of tmp as text, name of tmp as text, status type of tmp as text, name of service of account of tmp as text, host of account of tmp as text, status message of tmp as text, idle time of tmp as text}} end repeat if sortNames then set last_swap_position to length of listThem repeat while last_swap_position > 0 set comparisons_needed to last_swap_position - 1 set last_swap_position to 0 repeat with i from 1 to comparisons_needed if item 1 of item i of listThem > item 1 of item (i + 1) of listThem then set swap_item to item i of listThem set item i of listThem to item (i + 1) of listThem set item (i + 1) of listThem to swap_item set last_swap_position to i end if end repeat end repeat end if set empty to true repeat with aPerson in listThem set aService to item 4 of aPerson set aDisplayName to item 1 of aPerson set aName to item 2 of aPerson if showHosts then set aHost to item 5 of aPerson if aHost is not equal to "missing value" then set aService to item 4 of aPerson & "@" & aHost end if end if set aStatusMessage to item 6 of aPerson if aStatusMessage is not "" then set aStatusMessage to ", " & aStatusMessage end if set aStatus to item 3 of aPerson set aIdle to item 7 of aPerson if aIdle is not "" and aIdle is not "0" then set aStatus to aStatus & ", " & aIdle & "m idle" end if set itemText to "<item uid=\"" & aName & "\" arg=\"" & aName & "\"><title>" & aDisplayName & "</title><subtitle>" & aStatus & "@" & aService & aStatusMessage & "</subtitle>" if waitingMsgs contains aName then set res to res & itemText & "<icon>newmsg.png</icon></item>" set empty to false else if not unreadOnly then if item 3 of aPerson is not "available" then set res to res & itemText & "<icon>awayIcon.png</icon></item>" else set res to res & itemText & "<icon>icon.png</icon></item>" end if set empty to false end if end repeat if empty then if unreadOnly then set res to res & "<item uid=\"empty\" arg=\"empty\" valid=\"no\"><title>There is not any unread message</title><icon>newmsg.png</icon></item>" else set res to res & "<item uid=\"empty\" arg=\"empty\" valid=\"no\"><title>" & q & " not found</title><subtitle>Maybe contact is offline</subtitle><icon>no.png</icon></item>" end if end if end tell set res to res & "</items>"

on alfred_script(q) tell application "Adium" set fContact to contact q set anAccount to (account of fContact) if exists first chat window then set existing_window to first chat window else set existing_window to "" end if tell anAccount if existing_window is "" then set aChat to (make new chat with contacts {fContact} with new chat window) else set aChat to (make new chat with contacts {fContact} at end of (chats of existing_window)) end if end tell become active aChat activate end tell end alfred_script

V0.91 -- shows idle time if known -- shows status message if any
V0.9 -- different icon for contacts with unread messages
V0.8 -- further speed optimisation
V0.7 -- contacts cached - sorting is not longer time consuming and can be switch on for everybody
V0.6 -- added configuration for account servers to be shown or not
V0.5 -- Free DarkGlassReworked icons are used
